sentences.en: a precocious child who started her acting career at the age of 5
sentences.cn: 5岁便开始演艺生涯的超常儿童

sentences.en: a precocious child who walked and talked early
sentences.cn: 走路和说话都早的早熟儿童

sentences.en: Childhood hardship matured in him a precocious sense of responsibility.
sentences.cn: 儿时的磨难使他提早形成了一种责任感.

sentences.en: Despite her precocious talent for music and art, she failed both subjects at school.
sentences.cn: 尽管她小的时候在音乐和艺术方面有不凡的天赋，上学的时候这两门功课却都不及格。

sentences.en: From childhood, he was evidently at once rebellious and precocious.
sentences.cn: 从儿时起，他就明显地既叛逆又早熟。

sentences.en: Her precocious mathematical ability astounded her parents.
sentences.cn: 她那早慧的数学能力令她的父母非常吃惊.

sentences.en: It was no firework display of precocious talent.
sentences.cn: 它并不是早熟天才的平地一声雷.

sentences.en: Margaret was always a precocious child.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特一直是个早熟的孩子。

sentences.en: Mr. Stryver laughed till he shook his precocious paunch.
sentences.cn: 斯特莱佛先生哈哈大笑,笑得他过早出现的大肚子直抖.

sentences.en: Perhaps I was trying to impress him with my precocious wisdom.
sentences.cn: 或许我是想使他对我早熟的智慧加深印象.

sentences.en: Precocious flowers appear before the leaves as in some species of magnolias.
sentences.cn: 早熟花先于叶子出现,就像某些品种的木兰那样.

sentences.en: She burst on to the world tennis scene as a precocious 14-year old.
sentences.cn: 她14岁时就作为一名网球神童闯入了世界网坛。

sentences.en: Sue is a thoroughly precocious little madam if ever there was one.
sentences.cn: 休确实是个少见的早熟的小丫头。

sentences.en: The Jewish family pattern shows distinctive national and precocious characteristics.
sentences.cn: 犹太人的家庭模式有着鲜明的民族性和早熟性.

sentences.en: They become precocious experts in tragedy.
sentences.cn: 他们成了一批思想早熟、善写悲剧的能手.

sentences.en: This youngest boy, Andrew, was a precocious excellent athlete.
sentences.cn: 这个名叫安德鲁的最年轻的小伙子是个早熟且出类拔萃的运动员.

phrases.tran_cn: 性早熟；早熟青春期；性早熟症

trans.tran_cn: 早熟的，较早具备某种能力的，较早显出的，（儿童）老气的
trans.tran_en: a precocious child shows intelligence or skill at a very young age, or behaves in an adult way – sometimes used to show disapproval in British English
